label: 陣定
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: a process of discussion and debate by the senior nobles of the Council of State in mid-to-late Heian times. It was conducted when the monarch commanded, and afterward the monarch received a complete record of the proceedings for his reference in deciding a matter of serious consequence.
